title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Join Sendify as a Senior Software Engineer!**

At **Sendify**, we’re on a mission to help small businesses ship smarter. We streamline logistics with real-time pricing, comparison, booking, and tracking—all in one seamless platform. Now, we’re looking for a **Senior Software Engineer** to join our talented team and help us scale to the next level.

**Role Overview**
-----------------


We’re seeking a seasoned Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer to join our dynamic tech team. In this role, you’ll influence the technical foundation of the Sendify platform, develop new features, and maintain existing code. You’ll collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and customer success teams to deliver impactful solutions

#### 

#### **At Sendify you will:**

* Design and implement scalable cloud services using GoLang, React, and TypeScript.
* Build API-first integrations with e-commerce platforms and logistics providers.
* Enhance operational efficiency by automating processes within Sendify.
* Own the full development cycle, from concept to deployment.
* Shape our roadmap, influence system design, and mentor junior engineers.
* Engage in pair programming and code reviews to maintain high-quality standards.
* Contribute to the evolution of our tech stack and best practices.

#### 

#### **In order to succeed in this role, we believe you have:**

* 6+ years of software development experience, with a strong full-stack background.
* Expertise in GoLang, TypeScript, React, AWS (App Runner, RDS, CloudWatch), and MySQL.
* Familiarity with GitLab CI/CD and Pulumi (nice to have).
* A problem-solving mindset—you're excited by complex challenges and scalable solutions.
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills.
* Experience in startups or agile environments, comfortable with rapid iteration.
  
* 

**About Sendify**
-----------------

Logistics is built on top of handshakes, phone calls, and unread emails left in inboxes. Ever felt how easy it is to miss an email in your inbox? Imagine building your business on the same workflow.


Sendify helps ambitious small businesses to ship smarter. We wrap together real-time pricing, comparison, booking, and tracking in a clean and unified interface to allow customers to spend their time on their business, not logistics.

  

We’re **Great Place to Work** certified , meaning we’re not just building smart shipping solutions—we’re also creating an incredible workplace where people thrive.

  

Meet our teams & product!


Sendify Family


Life at Sendify


Our product

title: Junior Testutvecklare
description:
Som junior testutvecklare hos YABS får du arbeta med testautomation, kvalitetssäkring och prestandatester i agila team. Du kommer att utveckla och genomföra tester för att säkerställa att våra kunders system är stabila, skalbara och felfria. Oavsett om du är nyutexaminerad eller har några års erfarenhet, erbjuder vi en stimulerande miljö där du får utvecklas, lära dig nya teknologier och växa tillsammans. Tveka inte att söka jobb som testutvecklare på YABS!

**Vi söker dig som:**

* Har högskole- eller universitetsexamen inom IT, Teknik eller Systemvetenskap
* Programmeringskunskaper inom Python
* Har en grundläggande förståelse för mjukvarutestning och ett intresse för testautomatisering
* Är analytisk, noggrann och har ett intresse för test och kvalitetssäkring
* Kan uttrycka dig väl på svenska och engelska

**Vi erbjuder dig:**

  

* En levande arbetsplats med roliga aktiviteter, konferenser och utbildning
* Fortlöpande kompetensutveckling
* Ett företag där arbetsglädje, ambition och utveckling ligger i fokus
* Stora förmåner och trygga försäkringar

title: System Administrator
description:
We are looking for an experienced resourceful System Administrator that will help us run our production environments as well as maintain our office networks and IT infrastructure.
   

  

 You will be working in a team but also independently so you should have the ability and patience to communicate with a variety of interdisciplinary teams and users.
   

  

 Your goal will be to ensure that our technology infrastructure runs smoothly and efficiently and is properly documented and stand up to all security requirements needed for the ISO 27001 standard.
   

  

 The Responsibilities
   

  

* Install and configure Linux environment
* Manage network servers and technology tools
* Set up accounts and workstations
* Monitor performance and maintain systems according to requirements
* Troubleshoot issues and outages
* Ensure security through access controls, backups and firewalls
* Upgrade systems with new releases and patches
* Write and maintain technical documentation, manuals and IT policies


 Who you are
   

  

* Proven experience as a System Administrator, Network Administrator or similar role
* Experience with databases, networks (LAN, WAN) and patch management
* Knowledge of system security (e.g. intrusion detection systems) and data backup/recovery
* Familiarity with various operating systems and platforms
* Resourcefulness and problem-solving attitude


**Beneficial Skills And Experience**
* Mysql/maridb, Proxmox, Ceph, Aws, Nagios/Zabbix, Puppet, Nginx, Bash / Python scripting, Firewall/networking/switches, pfsense, Linux ubuntu, Google gsuite, Purchasing, ISMS audits, Vulnerability Scanning, Penetration testing, Internal support


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr-sweden@nolimitcity.com
   

  

 http://www.nolimitcity.com

title: Data Management Analyst
company_industry: Hospitals and Health Care, Information Services, and Health and Human Services
description:
*Är du en erfaren dataanalytiker som vill vara en ledare för Humanas Analytics team i Stockholm? Humana är en framstående aktör inom vård och omsorg, dedikerade till att använda data för att förbättra våra processer och beslut. Vi söker dig som är en erfaren Data Analyst som brinner för att effektivisera och automatisera. Vill du ta steget till att ta ett teamansvar?* 








  





 Missa inte denna chans att bli chef för Data och Analytics teamet hos Humana!
 







  





 OM TEAMET
 



 Du kommer att jobba tillsammans med dina skickliga kollegor i Analytics teamet. Du kommer att arbeta med dataanalyser och forma effektiva arbetssätt. I rollen som chef för teamet har du både frontend och backend kollegor som analyserar och tolkar komplexa datamängder för att identifiera mönster, trender och insikter. Du kommer primärt att jobba med Mercur som är vårt verktyg för ekonomiska rapporter medan övriga rapporter hanteras i Power BI i dagsläget.
 



  





  




* Du är ansvarig för ett mindre analyticsteam.
* Du kommer att arbeta med kravställning, modellera data i vårt datalager och bygga rapporter.
* I rollen jobbar du från IT nära ekonomiavdelningen och ger ett stort tekniskt stöd vad gäller ekonomiska rapporter, men även med övriga delar inom organisationen.
* Ditt team arbetar med spännande projekt i framkanten av datadrivet beslutsfattande.
* Teamet värdesätter kontinuerligt lärande, innovation och personlig utveckling.



  





  





 Placeringsort är Humanas Stockholmskontor i Stadshagen och du kommer ingå i ett team bestående av sex drivna och engagerade kollegor. Du har möjlighet att arbeta på distans två dagar i veckan.
 



  





  









 DIN BAKGRUND
 



 Du har flera års erfarenhet av dataanalyser där du är van att jobba med datavisualiseringsplattformar och skapande av användarvänliga dashboards. Vi ser gärna att du har jobbat med dataanalysprogram och erfarenhet av modellering av data. Vi tror att du i grunden har en utbildning inom dataanalys, ekonomi eller motsvarande.
 







  





 • Som person är du positiv och engagerad, med förmåga att driva och leda en grupp.
 



 • Du har en god förmåga att kommunicera komplex data på ett tydligt och effektivt sätt till olika delar i verksamheten.
 



 • I arbetet är du strukturerad och noggrann och mån om att leverera med kvalitet.
 



 • Du är van att arbeta med SQL.
 



 • Du har mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
 











  









**OM HUMANA OCH VAD VI SÖKER** 




  





 Vi erbjuder en dynamisk roll i en ledande organisation inom vård och omsorg där du får möjlighet att arbeta med datadrivna lösningar och bidra till positiva förändringar. Som ledare för ett team hos oss har du en nyckelroll på bolaget och din kompetens och erfarenhet är viktig.
 



  





  





  





 Humana erbjuder tjänster inom personlig assistans, individ- och familjeomsorg, äldreomsorg och bostäder med särskild service enligt LSS, Lagen om stöd och service för vissa funktionshindrade. Humana har 20 000 engagerade medarbetare i Sverige, Norge, Danmark och Finland som utför omsorgstjänster till över 9 000 människor. Vi har en prestigelös arbetsmiljö där vi uppmuntrar varandra till delaktighet och att sprida glädje på jobbet. Här drivs vi av utveckling och arbetar ständigt för att förbättra kvaliteten i vår verksamhet, där du som medarbetare är en viktig del i detta arbete.
 



  





  





  





**Är det dig vi söker eller har du tips på en bra person till rollen?** 




 Välkommen in med din ansökan, urval sker löpande så ansök redan idag. Har du tips på en bra person eller om du har frågor om rollen är du välkommen att kontakta Linda Mukka på Linda.mukka@houseofskills.se eller Linda Freij på mail Linda.freij@houseofskills.se.
 







  





  





 VÄLKOMMEN MED DIN ANSÖKAN!

title: Technology Department Manager to Payments | SEB, Solna
description:
SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From COBOL to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone. Are you ready to take on a new challenge? If so, you'll be interested in this opportunity!
   

  

**About The Role**
 You will lead a department with main responsibilities to develop and maintain the global payment platform and payment services in our internal and external channels. You will also be IT lead in the pay & get paid tribe within the A&P domain. The department consist of approximately 140 people in seven different teams, located in Stockholm, Örebro and Vilnius.
   

  

 A key focus of your role will be guiding and steering the department through the major transformation ongoing in the payment landscape, delivering according to plans from Payment Roadmap, as part of the Accounts & Payments domain agenda. You will lead your department together with a highly motived and skilled management team, drive change while maintaining high standards in daily operations.
   

  

 You will report to the Area Head and play an active role in the Payment & Reporting Management team.
   

  

**As a Technology Department Manager, you will:**
* Lead and guide your management team.
* Act as the Tribe IT Lead within the Pay & Get Paid tribe
* Communicate and closely interact with leading representatives at the different Business functions as well as with managers and architects within Tech.
* Secure stable and reliable applications with a robust maintenance organization.
* Ensure a healthy IT portfolio in your area from a risk, security, and compliance perspective.
* Be part of Payment & Reporting Management Team.


**To thrive in this role, we believe you have:**
* Several years of experience from leadership in the tech area
* Technical background or have successfully managed development teams and with a good understanding of the various aspects with the development process.
* A well-structured, self-driven, and curious approach to leadership
* A proven track record as an IT leader with experience driving change in complex, business-critical, and demanding environments through involvement and collaboration
* A strong commitment to leadership, with the ability to build trust, attract talent, and develop people effectively
* Excellent collaboration and communication skills, with the ability to interact easily with all levels across the bank.
* A solution-oriented mindset, strong analytical skills, and openness to exploring new ideas
* Well-developed oral and written communication skills in English.


**What we offer:**
* A key strategic role in one of SEB: s most interesting IT/Tech area
* Innovative working environment with highly motivated colleagues
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Friendly and welcoming culture
* Agile and modern ways of working


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than March 21st. If you have questions about the position, please contact Monja Renström, Head of Payments & Reporting Technology, by email  Monja.Renstrom @seb.se (we will not process applications via email).
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts. https://sebgroup.com/career https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: CTO - Stockholm
description:
**Join the planet’s most important fight!**
**Normative is now looking for a CTO in Stockholm to lead the Engineering organisation in Sweden.**
 At Normative, we're on a mission to accelerate the transition to a net-zero world. We provide science-based carbon accounting software and tailored advice from net-zero experts, empowering companies to reduce their carbon footprints.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Normative is looking for a Chief Technology Officer to replace the current CTO, who leaves after successfully upgrading the product, infrastructure and team.
   

  

 Working closely with the Chief Executive Officer, VP Product, SVP Sales & Director of Climate Strategy, VP Operations & CFO,the CTO will take a lead role in helping deliver the product road map and run a high velocity, high quality and high reliability team. In particular, the CTO will take a leading role in using AI and ML to increase automation and decrease the time to value for customers across the board and promote a culture of experimentation within the tech team.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Set ambitious technical direction, vision, road map and goals for the full company, in particular in terms of using AI/ML to increase automation and decrease the workload of our clients and internal servicing teams without compromising on rigor or accuracy
* Accountable for technical (e.g. product and technical road map) execution and outcomes internally as well as towards prospects and customers.
* Enable technical leadership in building high-performing, remote-first execution-oriented, collaborative and diverse teams.
* Together with the Executive leadership team develop and execute on long term strategies to grow the organization and enable it to fulfil its mission.
* Make the best use of engineering resources to hit our goals: a dependable and reliable product, leading the industry on key operational metrics, based on an efficient infrastructure, with a strong team that delivers reliably and feels empowered to place bets at pace.
* Upskill the engineering management team and create an environment that enables the internal growth of high-potential individuals.
* Set, own and visualize critical metrics and targets to ensure company goals are tracked and met.
* Bring fresh ideas and a reasoned approach to the executive team.
* Build best practices rooted in proven methods and enable high efficiency across core operations to enable delivery at pace with high reliability.
* Ultimate responsibility for the operations of the product including disaster recovery, incident management and business continuity.
* Represent Normative vis a vis the ecosystem and execute on ecosystem business strategies (co-creator, integration etc) Enterprise/Ecosystem.


**What You Bring**
* Extensive CTO experience with successful results from a rapidly growing tech scale up with high complexity.
* Deep experience from B2B SaaS companies targeted towards medium to enterprise customers.
* Proven understanding of the intersection of SaaS and the critical technical roadmap to execute their design, construction and architecture.
* Proven impact and fundamental understanding of data architecture, science and modeling to achieve business outcomes.
* Proven success as an empowering leader with obsessions on execution, owning what matters and building high performing tech organizations.
* Proven success in building remote, diverse and inclusive teams excelling at business focus and cross-collaboration.
* Exceptional communication skills and deeply collaborative.
* Driven by impact, Mission and relentless execution.


**Key Leadership Characteristics**
* Accountability & Prioritizations
* Communication, Clarity & Inspirational
* Curious, Learning & Innovation
* Empowering and Developing
* Collaboration
* Inclusion & Belonging


 We also believe you enjoy working in an environment with typical challenges of a growing company, asking a lot of questions and learning new things. At Normative we believe that collaboration with teammates is essential and you’ll thrive if you like to explain and discuss technical approaches with other engineers.
   

  

 If you are a driven and passionate individual with a strong desire to make a positive impact on the world, and a real love for Engineering, we encourage you to apply. This is an exciting opportunity to join a mission-driven company and make a real difference in the fight against climate change.
   

  

 Join us and be a part of something bigger than yourself. Together, we can create a more sustainable future for all.
   

  

*Not sure you meet 100% of our qualifications? Apply anyway!*
**Location**
 Normative operates on a hybrid remote model with offices in Stockholm, Copenhagen, and London. For this role you will be located in our wonderful HQ in Stockholm.
   

  

*At this time we are not able to offer relocation or VISA support for this position.*
**Benefits**
* Market-based salaries and annual merit-based salary reviews
* 30 days/year of paid vacation + up to 2 additional days off
* Pension and parental leave
* 5,000 SEK wellness allowance (friskvårdsbidrag) + 1 wellness hour per week
* Social and team-building activities (off-site, after work, winter/summer parties)
* An opportunity to make a real positive impact on the world
* A friendly, supportive and humble working culture


*We review our benefits packages on a regular basis and might modify our benefits from time to time.*

title: Head of IT Procurement
description:
Step into a leadership role as our Head of IT Procurement, shaping strategy and fostering collaborative growth.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for an experienced leader to our new IT Procurement team. This team is responsible for professionally procuring all IT related goods, licenses, and services in the joint If and Topdanmark business, as well as managing the relationships with all IT vendors. Good financial control and reporting comes with the territory. The team will be formed under the new leader’s management by integrating the IT procurement teams from If and Topdanmark. The new leader will also secure the integration and development of workflow tools and processes to match. Ability to grow and nurture a network of internal and external stakeholders is also very important part in this role.
   

  

**About The Team**
 IT Procurement is part of IT Operations, with the objective of delivering stable, flexible, and cost-efficient services to support If’s core business, keeping vital IT systems running at all relevant times. Adequate service contracts supporting this objective are necessary for success.
   

  

 The team consists today of altogether 21 experience people organised in 4 departments/areas of responsibility. They are responsible for a significant contract portfolio and playing a crucial role in securing the cooperation of suppliers to support our high ambitions regarding operational excellence.
   

  

**Who Are You**
 You are an experienced leader who has the ability to lead other leaders and key specialists in an environment with high expectations on delivery precision. Coaching your team and help them grow in their careers is a large part of your leadership skills and you foster a collaborative environment where everyone thrives. You are a true network builder, and you collaborate with many internal and external stakeholders, (i.e., the team’s main clients (IT Engineering units), legal, and controlling) mainly on strategic level.
   

  

**You also have**
* Several years of leadership experience in which you have built and managed high-achieving and well-being-oriented teams.
* Leadership experience of leading other leaders
* Experience of financial responsibility to follow up and report on purchasing budgets. Analyse spending trends and pursue saving opportunities.
* Participated in previous procurement projects’ steering groups and strategic supplier governance.
* Proven track record of being a seasoned negotiator as you will act as the “escalation level” in contract negotiations.
* Competence to keep If IT Services A/S’s contract portfolio current and compliant, by developing and executing the contract lifecycle processes.
* Legal knowledge on a working level and understand contractual matters emanating from written clauses.
* Excellent knowledge in English and one Nordic language; written and spoken.


**We offer**
 In the same way that we place high demands on you as an employee, we also expect you to place high demands on us as an employer. Here are some of the benefits of working at If:
   

  

* An including workplace where everyone is welcome and a highly skilled professional environment
* Career and development opportunities in the biggest insurance company in the Nordics
* Possibility of hybrid workplace
* Health promoting workplace
* Great insurance benefits


**Additional Facts And The Recruitment Process**
**Application deadline:** 
 Screening and interviewing will start immediately. However, application deadline is March 16th.
   

**To apply for the position:** 
 Please attach your CV.
   

**Work location:** 
 Stockholm, Oslo, Copenhagen, Turku or Helsinki
   

**Travelling:** 
 There will be traveling on regular basis included in this role.
   

  

**Start:** 
 By agreement.
   

  

 For more information, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Joanna Bonn Rosén by e-mail, Joanna.bonn.rosen@if.se
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

*Background checks will be done in accordance with the law in the country of employment for this specific role.*
  

**About Us**
  

***We are If. Our purpose is to give people confidence today to shape their tomorrow.**
 To make this possible, trust is our backbone. We stay ahead and challenge ourselves to grow. And we always put our hearts into it – because it takes more than bright minds to make brilliant things happen.
   

  

 We are the leading insurance company in the Nordics/Baltics and a stable employer with 7,900 dedicated professionals. But most importantly, we are protectors of people, enablers of companies and encouragers of dreams. With our joint force of expertise and engagement we always stand by our customers’ side. Giving them the security and the confidence to be curious, explore new worlds, start new businesses and live their lives.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer, convinced that a diverse and inclusive work culture boosts innovation and the growth of intellectual capital in many ways. It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from, or what you look like. It is the different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences each of us have and share, that will make a difference.
   

  

 Come and join us!*

title: Delivery Lead - Platform
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 As Delivery Lead you will own and ensure cross team and cross domain deliveries. You will have the overview perspective and own the progress and all project related communication and planning.
   

  

**As Delivery Lead You Will**
* Work closely with stakeholders across Engineering, Product, Operations, and Infrastructure to plan and coordinate software projects with high quality and at speed.
* On a daily basis provide direction and guidance of scaled agile practices across multiple teams and continuously focus on improving and maintaining deliveries across teams.
* Take care of the overall milestone planning, execution, delivery and release of our largest and most complex Engineering cross-team initiatives and projects.
* Effectively monitor project progress and present project updates and status to relevant stakeholders and project team members.
* Identify, diagnose and remove cross-team impediments so teams can deliver.
* Set up, implement and evolve cross-product line processes for managing initiatives, projects and dependencies with optimal output and progress whilst keeping autonomy in the product teams.


**Requirements**
 We are looking for a person who is great at leading deliverables in an agile environment - not through reporting lines or "owning resources" but by creating trust, structure, overview and through enabling good collaboration and communications. You instill energy in the people you work with and have a knack for building report with both technical and non-technical colleagues, at all levels. You don't accept the status quo and welcome challenges to change and improve. You easily grasp the technical details from the holistic company-wide perspective.
   

  

* At least a few years of relevant background from software organizations such as Delivery Lead, Project Manager, Engineering Manager, Entrepreneur, Scrum Master or Agile Coach
* Experience with Agile methodologies e.g., Kanban, Scrum, Agile
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in English - both verbal and written.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey.  If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Application Consultant
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
Sirocco is one of Sweden's oldest management consulting firms specializing in CRM. Our expertise lies in designing and implementing solutions across leading SaaS platforms such as Salesforce, Microsoft, HubSpot, Tacton, and more. SAFe Agile is our delivery framework of choice, making our 90 colleagues across 5 countries able to contribute seamlessly to our projects.
 



  





**Who are we looking for:** 




 A
 **Microsoft Dynamics Application Specialist** 
 with 2-5+ years of hands-on Dynamics 365 experience. The ideal candidate excels in problem-solving, thrives in collaborative team settings, and has strong communication skills. A proactive mindset and eagerness to learn new skills are essential for driving success in dynamic projects.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Implementation: Customize and configure Dynamics 365 applications to meet client requirements.
* Development: Utilize Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI and Power Pages to develop custom business solutions.
* DevOps: Apply DevOps practices connected to a Agile way of working to streamline development, testing, and deployment processes.
* CRM Expertise: Provide insights and solutions for Customer Relationship Management (CRM) challenges. Work closely with clients to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions.
* Agile Methodologies: Participate in Agile/Scrum teams, contributing to SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) practices.
* Training & Support: Offer training sessions and ongoing support to end-users.



  





**Requirements:** 



* Swedish Speaker, Fluent English
* Proficiency in Microsoft Power Platform (D365, Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Pages).
* Familiarity with DevOps, Jira- tools and practices.
* Good understanding of Agile methodologies, including Scrum and SAFe.
* Basic understanding of the concept of what JavaScript and Plug-ins can do
* Knowledge regarding the different tools used for Dynamics 365 and in which scenarios these tools should be used.
* Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Functional Consultant
* Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Fundamentals
* Scrum Master Certification or SAFe Agilist Certification



  





**How to Apply** 




 Through LinkedIn “Easy Apply” button.

title: Teknisk Chef (CTO)
company_industry: Human Resources Services and Legal Services
description:
**Arbetsförmedlingen, VO IT, IT-avdelningen. Vi söker Teknisk Chef (CTO) till Arbetsförmedlingen.** 




  





**Arbetsförmedlingen är mitt i en stor transformation. Vi söker en erfaren och inspirerande teknisk chef. Som Teknisk chef (CTO) kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i att driva de digitala aspekterna av transformationen och forma framtidens myndighet. Nu har du chansen att få bygga upp och leda enheten Tekniska kontoret (CTO Office). Är du den engagerande och visionära teknisk chef vi letar efter, som leder ditt team med självförtroende?** 




  





**Vilka är IT på Arbetsförmedlingen** 




 VO IT är en central kraft i myndighetens transformation. Genom att digitalisera och automatisera våra processer bidrar vi konkret till att flera människor kommer i arbete. Vi är stolta över att tillämpa den senaste tekniken för att nå våra gemensamma mål, vi är exempelvis ledande inom offentlig sektor när det gäller nyttjande av AI.
 



  





**Mer om rollen** 




 Som Teknisk Chef kommer du att vara teknikledare för hela Arbetsförmedlingen, övervaka alla tekniska aspekter av myndighetens transformation. Chefen för Tekniska kontoret är tillika myndighetens chefsarkitekt. Teknisk chef kommer att tillsammans med sina medarbetare på Tekniska kontoret arbeta nära verksamhets - och teknikteam för att skapa myndighetens tekniska ramverk och gå i spetsen för dess genomförande. Tekniska chefen kommer att ingå i VO IT:s ledningsgrupp och rapporterar till IT Direktör (CIO).
 



 Utöver att leda tekniska initiativ förväntas du också visa starkt ledarskap och beslutsfattande.
 



  





**Ansvar:** 



* Driva och utveckla den tekniska färdplanen och säkerställa att den överensstämmer med myndighetens färdplan
* Bygga upp och leda enheten Tekniska Kontoret som består av seniora arkitekter inom områdena system, infrastruktur, informationshantering, processhantering, AI
* Bygga och upprätthålla en högpresterande kultur, främja en miljö som prioriterar lagarbete, leverans och en enastående användarupplevelse.
* Säkerställa en robust, skalbar och säker arkitektur, inklusive beredskapsplanering och dataskydd.
* Hålla ett skarpt öga på framväxande teknologier, utvärdera deras relevans och potentiella värde för myndigheten.



  





**Vårt erbjudande** 




 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning på heltid som kan komma att inledas med sex månaders provanställning. Placeringsorten är Solna eller enligt överenskommelse.
 



  





 Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten att arbeta på en arbetsplats där vi värdesätter balans mellan arbete och privatliv. Du får tillgång till ett generöst semesteravtal, förtroendearbetstid samt möjlighet att arbeta på distans upp till 49 procent på årsbasis. Då Arbetsförmedlingen är en beredskapsmyndighet kan du komma att bli krigsplacerad i din tjänst. Mer om att jobba hos oss
 



  





 Säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585) kan komma att genomföras innan anställningen påbörjas.
 



  





 Hos oss gör du verklig skillnad för individer och för samhället i stort.
 



  





**Grundläggande kvalifikationskrav** 



* Flerårig aktuell erfarenhet av Chefskap med verksamhets- och personalansvar
* Relevant akademisk examen såsom t.ex. civilingenjör inom Datavetenskap, teknisk fysik eller teknisk matematik. Eller motsvarande erfarenhet förvärvad på annat sätt som arbetsgivaren bedömer som likvärdig och relevant
* Aktuell erfarenhet av att leda specialister och/eller chefer
* Aktuell erfarenhet av att leda en organisation i förändring



  





**Meriterande för tjänsten** 



* Aktuell erfarenhet som CTO



  





 Som anställd hos oss förväntas du arbeta rättvist, opartiskt och med hög integritet, samt bidra till att upprätthålla och stärka förtroendet för vår myndighet. Mer om statliga värdegrunden
 



  





 Utöver dessa kvalifikationer har du personlig förmåga och fallenhet att arbeta i enlighet med
 



 Arbetsförmedlingens medarbetarskap:
 



  





 Medarbetare på Arbetsförmedlingen:
 


* **Tar ansvar** 
 för sina arbetsprestationer och sitt bidrag till helheten
* **Anpassar sig** 
 till förändring och oförutsedda händelser
* **Tar initiativ** 
 till utveckling och bidrar till förbättring



  





**Chefer är medarbetare på Arbetsförmedlingen som dessutom:** 



* **Pekar ut riktning** 
 för sina medarbetare och följer upp prestationer
* **Undanröjer hinder** 
 i vardagen och hanterar problem
* **Skapar delaktighet** 
 i arbetet och främjar utveckling



  





**Personliga egenskaper som är framgångsrika för rollen:** 



* Inspirera och leda ditt team med självförtroende.
* Hög nivå av ansvarighet och stor integritet.
* Ett nyfiket tänkesätt, särskilt om framväxande teknologier och olika discipliner.
* Proaktiv och resultatorienterad



  





**Ansökan** 




 Låter det här som en tjänst för dig? Välkommen med din ansökan senast 2025 - 03 - 31.
 



 Bifoga ditt CV där du specificerar årtal, månad och arbetsuppgifter för varje anställning, samt intyg som styrker kraven om utbildning och/eller arbetslivserfarenhet i din ansökan.
 



  





 Det är viktigt att du besvarar urvalsfrågorna detaljerat och sanningsenligt, för att vi ska få en tydlig bild av din erfarenhet. Om efterfrågad information inte framgår riskerar du bli bortsållad i urvalet. Du behöver inte skicka in ett personligt brev.
 



  





 Under rekryteringsprocessen kan urvalstester förekomma. Vi kommer att hålla dig informerad genom hela rekryteringsprocessen. Mer om vår rekryteringsprocess.
 



 Har du skyddade personuppgifter kontaktar du den rekryteringspartner som finns namngiven i annonsen så får du hjälp med att skicka in din ansökan.
 



  





*I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med Experis. Vid frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsult Carina Eyoma, carina.eyoma@se.experis.com, 073-0862275* 
 .
 



  





 Vi arbetar aktivt för att vara en myndighet fri från diskriminering. Det är viktigt för oss att all
 



 kompetens tas tillvara och vi välkomnar alla sökande. Vi ser positivt på om du har kunskaper i något av våra nationella minoritetsspråk.
 



  





**Välkommen till jobbet som får Sverige i arbete! Här arbetar du på regeringens uppdrag för en arbetsmarknad som hjälper människor framåt. Vi frigör möjligheter så att arbetssökande hittar sysselsättning och arbetsgivare sin nästa medarbetare. För att nå målet behöver vi samarbeta, i myndigheten men också med olika externa aktörer i hela landet. Tillsammans driver vi förändring, utvecklar nya arbetssätt och skapar lösningar som gör att Sverige kan fortsätta framåt.** 




  





 Mer om vår organisation och vårt uppdrag.

title: 2025 Graduate Talent Program - Global Markets - Stockholm
company_industry: Banking, Financial Services, and Investment Banking
description:
**Job Reference #**
 300641BR
   

  

**City**
 Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

**Your role**
 Interested in working in financial services, specifically learning about global market trends, but not sure where to start? Do you want to work for a firm with a truly global footprint?
   

  

 We're looking for ambitious students to join our 2025 Global Markets Graduate Talent Program.
   

  

 You’ll get to
   

  

* buy and sell financial instruments for our clients
* extract market moving data from a variety of sources to inform decisions across our Global Markets business
* provide clients with information about recent market trends and offer trades at the best prices


**Your team**
 You’ll be working in our Global Markets business. We advise clients and do everything that’s needed to buy and sell securities for them from start to finish. We work with hedge funds, pension funds, asset managers and family offices to provide coverage, advisory, capital markets and financing services.
   

  

**Your expertise**
 We’re looking for a candidate who
   

  

* is graduating between September 2023 and September 2025
* has or is on track for at least a 2.1 (UK grading system) or equivalent in their first undergraduate degree
* has values that align with ours hard-working, trustworthy, dedicated and collaborative
* is a strategic thinker with strong communication skills
* is motivated to work in a business with high demands and tight deadlines


 We’re looking for someone who’s curious and wants to thrive in a business that never stops moving. We welcome all majors, but it’s important to have an interest in the financial industry. We want to see what makes you unique and discover what you can bring to our team.
   

  

**About Us**
 UBS is the world’s largest and only truly global wealth manager. We operate through four business divisions Global Wealth Management, Personal & Corporate Banking, Asset Management and the Investment Bank. Our global reach and the breadth of our expertise set us apart from our competitors.
   

  

 With our large and diverse team operating internationally, we have a presence in all major financial centers in more than 50 countries. Although we all come from different backgrounds and specializations, two things unite us the conviction that we’re stronger together, and the will and curiosity to constantly improve.
   

  

**Join us**
 We know that it's our people, with their unique backgrounds, skills, experience levels and interests, who drive our ongoing success. You’ll get to learn from the best at UBS, inspirational leaders from across the business and experts in everything financial industry. Together we’re more than ourselves. Ready to be part of #teamUBS and make an impact?
   

  

**Disclaimer / Policy Statements**
 UBS is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures, perspectives, skills and experiences within our workforce.

title: IT Business Consultant
description:
Linde Gas AB
   

  

**IT Business Consultant**
 Stockholm (Solna), Sweden (req22283)
   

  

**What You Will Enjoy Doing**
* As IT Project Manager at Linde Gas, you will play a key role in driving business-related IT projects with a focus on ERP and optimization
* You will work in a small agile organization while becoming part of a large global company, where you will manage several parallel projects and drive initiatives from idea to implementation
* The focus is on SAP, Windows systems, CRM and other ERP solutions
* You will collaborate with different business units to optimize processes, translating the needs of the business into concrete projects and solutions
* This is an opportunity to work with business-related IT and influence the development of the business in a dynamic and flexible work environment where you get to run your own projects


**What Makes You Great**
* Relevant academic degree in IT, technology or similar and experience in running IT projects, preferably within ERP and CRM
* Ability to work independently and run several projects in parallel. Have experience from a consulting company, or have had a similar consultative job role
* You are proactive, curious and have strong problem-solving skills. You are communicative and enjoy collaborating with different parts of the organization
* The role requires an independent and forward-thinking person who enjoys taking responsibility and finding solutions for business-related IT
* Your ability to quickly adapt to new challenges and drive projects forward is crucial
* You are analytical, structured and have a strong business understanding


**Why you will love working with us**
 At Linde you will be surrounded by knowledgeable people who love what they do. We are creative and strive to move our company forward. We take pride in our people and work hard to provide an enriching, enjoyable place to work. We have a clear vision: to be the place where a diverse mix of dedicated people want to come, stay and excel. We are always improving, and because we are part of Linde, a global company, our people have limitless opportunities to grow and make an impact, all over the world.
   

  

 Our values – Safety, Integrity, Accountability, Inclusion and Community are at the heart of everything we do. Through our values we shape an environment that puts safety first, where people do things the right way, new ideas are encouraged, everyone can be themselves and we support our local communities.
   

  

**What we offer you!**
 At Linde, the sky is not the limit. If you’re looking to build a career where your work reaches beyond your job description and betters the people with whom you work, the communities we serve, and the world in which we all live, at Linde, your opportunities are limitless. Be Linde. Be Limitless.
   

  

 In addition to an attractive compensation package, we offer you social benefits, such as a competitive pension plan and insurance package and a hybrid workplace. We actively work towards gender equality and diversity; therefore, we are happy to see applicants with different backgrounds and experiences.
   

  

**Have we inspired you? Let´s talk about it**
 We are looking forward to receiving your complete application (motivation letter, CV, certificates) via our online job market.
   

  

**Your contact person**
 Linde Gas AB
   

  

 Director IT Region Europe North
   

  

 Fredrik Grenander
   

  

 +46 70 376 5857
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Linde does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Linde employees or any other organization location. Linde is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.
   

  

 Any designations used of course apply to persons of all genders. The form of speech used here is for simplicity only.
   

  

 Linde Gas AB acts responsibly towards its shareholders, business partners, employees, society and the environment in every one of its business areas, regions and locations across the globe. The company is committed to technologies and products that unite the goals of customer value and sustainable development.
